落下了很多亏钱机会

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi.
As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder
The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount.
Risks explained 🧵
articles.title: 紧跟学习一番CRV最近的状况，7月都在外面玩 落下了很多亏钱机会

articles.description:
Re ✔️结合自己判断的未来有可能有机会的方向，或者是你认知自己有天赋和才能的方向，去做一些「副业」，在选择副业上需确定是随着时间精力的投入，能够带来复利效应的事业。
万事开头难，不建议起步尝试成本太高的副业，大环境不好的情况下副业也会很卷，大多数普通人都没有承受高成本创业失败的资本。 🙁

articles.description:
RT GK
So much tweets (Xs) amd discussion about $MKR now, but I was posting about it in May when price was 700.
Me & boyz on my Discord bought it at avg price 700$-750$.
 Tbh fully thanks to @ChainEDGE_io 
Just an amazing tool from @OnChainWizard

GK: Whats going on with $MKR #makerdao ?
While #crypto market was red yesterday, $MKR made +0,8% 
So, there is a big whale, probably institution accumulating this coin

articles.description:
RT Narratives - Coming Soon
I vaguely remember listening to an interview with @OnChainWizard last summer about @chainedge. 
I’m impressed but not surprised to see how far it’s come and what’s been built. 
The rise of onchain is a surprise to many but a bet some of us made over a year ago.

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
August / September last dip to buy or what lads

FS Insight: The only consistent period of weakness for #Bitcoin occurs from mid-August through September. 
It's important to remember that seasonality is an imperfect measure of risk, so it should be taken with a grain of salt.
